name: RTFD
description:
Strange things are happening in this world. Your fellow robots are disappearing every day. Who else can help them, if not the Robot Task Force Department! Your mission is to find out who kidnapped them and save them all! But shh, it's a top secret mission!

RTFD is a 2D platformer game where you manage your resources in a way where you can successfully end every single level and get the best score! There are two game endings depending on your play through, which one will you get? 

Note: This is my first ever created game and it was done as a school project.

Patch 1.1.: Fixed some collisions and animations based on feedback.

Patch 1.2.: Fixed difficulty and missing features.
